snippet: America should allow exports of liquefied natural gas but guard against the risks.
abstract: Op-Ed article by environmental researcher Michael A Levi argues that America should share the benefits of the natural gas energy boom by allowing exports of liquefied natural gas, but be careful to protect the environment and low-income consumers at the same time.
lead_paragraph: America should allow exports of liquefied natural gas but guard against the risks.
